txt.en: 'The horses are sounding hungry, and I have been told their troughs are running empty. I need to have a stable-hand feed the horses very shortly, or they may get agitated, but the helpers are busy at the moment! Can you please help me start on the task and gather the grain? As soon as you get back with it, a helper should be available to feed them.\n\n'There are many bags and sacks of grain around the farm; some might be empty, but there should be enough full ones. Hurry back with the grain!'
'Well done! We should be stocked for a little while now. Thank you for your help!'
Éogar can always use more help on his farm, and today he needs help feeding the horses.
The grain was mouldy and unfit for horses.
There are many bags and sacks of grain spread around the main buildings of Hengstacer Farm.
Return to Éogar with the grain
Éogar is found by the stables of the horse-farm.
